qas.question: What are the main types of public transportation?
How many companies are involved with the network of buses?
How many stations are there in total in the Nanjing metro system?
When does Nanjing expect to finish it's light rail line?
How many bus routes are there in Nanjing?

context: The city also boasts an efficient network of public transportation, which mainly consists of <a0_0>bus, taxi and metro systems<a0_0/>. The bus network, which is currently run by <a1_0>three companies<a1_0/> since 2011, provides <a4_0>more than 370 routes<a4_0/> covering all parts of the city and suburban areas. Nanjing Metro Line 1, started service on September 3, 2005, with 16 stations and a length of 21.72 km. Line 2 and the 24.5 km-long south extension of Line 1 officially opened to passenger service on May 28, 2010. At present, Nanjing has a metro system with a grand total of 223.6 kilometers (138.9 mi) of route and <a2_0>121 stations<a2_0/>. They are Line 1, Line 2, Line 3, Line 10, Line S1 and Line S8. The city is planning to complete a 17-line Metro and light-rail system by <a3_0>2030<a3_0/>. The expansion of the Metro network will greatly facilitate the intracity transportation and reduce the currently heavy traffic congestion.
